New Records: The Tigers erupted for six runs in the eighth inning, securing a 9-1 win over the Athletics.
Key Match Events: The Tigers scored six runs in the eighth inning to seal the victory.
Trey Sweeney hit a home run during the third inning.
Pre-Game Insights: After four consecutive one-run games, the Tigers ensured Sunday’s series finale wasn’t a nail-biter.
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers gained ground in the playoff chase with the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Oakland Coliseum in Oakland, Calif.
